name: Aleksander Heintz
bio: I love programming, and do it both professionally and as a hobby. At work I do most javascript and typescript, but I've also done a lot of F# and C#.

name: André König
bio: I'm a sofware architect & engineer and I love to share knowledge, because I think that everybody should be able to learn how to develop software.

name: Archana Sriram
bio: JavaScript and Node.js are my top programming languages. I can't imagine writing them without TypeScript. I'm a professional software engineer with over two decades of work experience. I love to teach and mentor.

name: Alexandre Gomes
bio: Full-Stack JavaScript developer. Lover of all things JS, TS, React and GraphQL. I enjoy learning by doing, and helping others learn the same way.
